course_title: Research Topics in Political Science: Intl. Political Economy
class_notes:
Research on selected topics and problems in political science. Class will fulfill the "research" requirement for the political science major. May be repeated for credit when the topic varies.
Class is intended for Seniors and Juniors needing to fulfill the RSCH requirement in Political Science.
course_description: Research on selected topics and problems in political science. Class will fulfill the "research" requirement for the political science major. May be repeated for credit when the topic varies.
prerequisites: POLS 208 or POLS_OX 208 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
